content.question: The photograph shown was taken by Dorothea Lange. Analyze how and why Lange’s photograph was purposefully composed to convey meaning to a general public.

frqParts.text: The photograph shown was taken by Dorothea Lange. Analyze how and why Lange’s photograph was purposefully composed to convey meaning to a general public.

topic.text: 4.2: Purpose and Audience in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Describe visual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. form.  b. style.  c. materials.  d. technique.  e. content.
